wikipedia_page.main: Michael "Mick"/"Mike" Harrison (birth unknown) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s, 1970s and 1980s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and England, and at club level for Hull F.C. (two spells), and Leeds, as a centre, or prop, i.e. number 3 or 4, or, 8 or 10, during the era of contested scrums.

response: Michael, Mike or Mick Harrison may refer to:
*Mick Harrison (rugby league), English rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s
*Mick Harrison (comic books), pseudonym of Randy Stradley
